title: Catch That L!
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Coach K's farewelL, Brittney Griner and your stories about 'quitting' football!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones cackles at Duke losing to unranked UNC in Coach K's final home game as coach of the Blue Devils (1:28) and sheds light on WNBA star Brittney Griner being detained in Russia after customs officials said they found "hashish oil" in her luggage (14:43). Plus, an IYHH including doomsday "preppers" saying "no" to bunkers (24:48) and your voicemails from what made you "quit" playing football (35:43)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @borenbears shares the UN climate report; ‘Atlas of human suffering’ worse, bigger: https://bit.ly/3vLKSgd
  2. @ainecain shares that manufacturers have reported a spike in demand for underground shelters: https://bit.ly/3IRg80V
  3. @will_coldwell asks the question, what happens when AI knows how you feel?: https://bit.ly/3KoOSqX
